import React from 'react' import '../styles/contact.css'; import ContactAvatar from '../assets/img/avatar/ar-contact-avatar.png'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { faGoogle, faBehance, faGithub, faFacebook, faInstagram } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons" import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; const iconGoogle = const iconBehance = const iconGithub = const iconFacebook = const iconInstagram = const linkBehance = "https://www.behance.net/andrearecuyo"; const linkGithub = "https://github.com/andrearecuyo"; const linkFacebook = "https://www.facebook.com/andreapriel2606/"; const linInstagram = "https://www.instagram.com/andrearecuyo/"; function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); //This is important, i'm not sure why, but the email won't send without it emailjs.sendForm('YOUR_SERVICE_ID', 'template_axnny8j', e.target, 'user_4SuOC4uQqqnFbfn5vsu09') .then((result) => { window.location.reload() //This is if you still want the page to reload (since e.preventDefault() cancelled that behavior) }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); } function Contact() { return (

Have a question or want to work together?

Let me contact you or reach out to me on my email.

© 2021 Andrea Recuyo
) } export default Contact;
